[quote=“Chrix, post:17, topic:525848”]My point Edward is why make an example of every RSC servers flaw on this website, don’t you have some coding to do?[/quote]I’m not pointing out every flaw, not even close, I’m pointing out things that break the rules on here…

item.dc:creator: @woodhacker woodhacker
item.description:
@woodhacker wrote:

Chrix:

My point Edward is why make an example of every RSC servers flaw on this website, don’t you have some coding to do?

-1

Chrix moderator at this server = avoid

My legit char ‘Gibbs’ was banned on projp2p for autobuying arrows. I had not noticed him calling for me when buying the arrows. He banned me claiming i had autoed for weeks. Later on when the staff unbanned all banned accounts, it was revealed that gibbs had public chat block off, and 50 arrows and bolts in inventory.

Chrix was ignorant, didnt make even the smallest effort to really see if the ban was an error. GG avoid plz

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Chrix Chrix
item.description:

My point Edward is why make an example of every RSC servers flaw on this website, don’t you have some coding to do?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Chrix, post:12, topic:525848”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=644589.msg4337062#msg4337062 date=1374540890]

[quote author=youtubefan link=topic=644589.msg4337059#msg4337059 date=1374540544]

Nothing makes me want to play a server like seeing features posted that have been released in other sources, or by OPs who have the “First Time Poster” title!
[/quote]If you didn’t notice, this is PP2P, with a different name. He didn’t even go through the trouble of removing it in the pictures…

BTW OP you’re only allowed to have 1 forum account…

isn’t that what you wanted? throw up king ill play
[/quote]All I wanted him to do is stop breaking the rules… Making another forum account is against the rules, especially when you’re evading a mute in the process.

well i think the server is good not because of the owner or by the name of the server… but because of the content who cares if the name banned or not.
[/quote]It’s banned for a reason… Just because you don’t care about the rules doesn’t mean people should get special treatment.

It was banned due to Matt selling Pixels for real life currency (i.e. party hats, stats, ect)… and isn’t that what Pyru is currently doing in RSCE? Ban RSCE and unban PP2P.

Edit: May I also add that the owner of RSCDomination is not selling items or subscriptions, he is offering the server free without breaking any Moparscape rules now that he has changed the name of the server and is editing it’s content.[/quote]Why do you keep acting as if I have any control over what servers are banned or unbanned from these forums? I’ve explained numerous times that I’ve PM’d several staff members and pointed out that RSCE is in violation of the rules.

This is the only response I’ve gotten:

[quote=“Ruby”][quote author=CodeForFame link=action=profile;u=381058 date=1371243581]

I support Rubys cleanup, and as said before I have bad feedback for this server. The reason being it has had relatively no updates and allows the sell of party hats (from Pyru) for 80$ in which the money goes to his bank account, now who does that remind you of? Anyone remember Matt from PP2P, well Luke(Kryptix) myself and at first Tommy(Gawdz) decided to make RSCE in order to put PP2P out of business due to Matt selling party hats for irl money eventually taking in a large player base which we took away from him with the promise of NO ITEMS TO BE SOLD FOR GAIN. Now basically all Pyru is doing is ruining Lukes dream (well all 3 of our dreams) and is making a mockery of the RSC community.

What happened with Matt from PP2P and PP2P itself? This community admins/mods deleted its thread and got rid of Matt for selling virtual goods for his own benefit about 3-4 years ago… what is Pyru doing? The same… it makes me sick this thread is still up as well as the server.

Discuss.

Chrix,

Relatively no updates? Oh, since taking ownership, I’ve dished out updates pretty much weekly. There has been countless bug fixes, changes and implementations, including new landscapes, quests, wilderness changes, a mini-game, IP Limitations and much more. I am not sure what you would classify an “update” if those aren’t considered by you.

The sale of hats, is to fund the server. The money doesn’t go to me so quit making false accusations. The method in place to re-sell hats, in no-way, shape or form hurts the community or economy. The hats are all taken from banned accounts, which are still technically in “circulation”. I destroy 80% of the hats, if they have multiple and offer the other(s) up for donation.

From what I gather, you sell GP for IRL cash, so it’s quite hypocritical for you to post this rant.

/Discussion

He’s admitted to breaking rule 8, according to the following link, again…
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html

He isn’t selling anything through his site and isn’t advertising his donation system (merely defending it) so there’s really nothing I can do with that. Sorry.[/quote]

What Ruby said is strictly not true…

x921Pta.png758×572

26VhIS6.png733×298

Though, nothing will be done about it, because the staff members don’t seem to respond to PMs.

Anyway, it doesn’t matter what is being done, currently, on a server that was banned from advertising. It’s banned, and isn’t allowed. End of discussion.

Read full topic

Nothing makes me want to play a server like seeing features posted that have been released in other sources, or by OPs who have the “First Time Poster” title!

BTW OP you’re only allowed to have 1 forum account…

isn’t that what you wanted? throw up king ill play
[/quote]All I wanted him to do is stop breaking the rules… Making another forum account is against the rules, especially when you’re evading a mute in the process.

well i think the server is good not because of the owner or by the name of the server… but because of the content who cares if the name banned or not.
[/quote]It’s banned for a reason… Just because you don’t care about the rules doesn’t mean people should get special treatment.[/quote]

It was banned due to Matt selling Pixels for real life currency (i.e. party hats, stats, ect)… and isn’t that what Pyru is currently doing in RSCE? Ban RSCE and unban PP2P.

Edit: May I also add that the owner of RSCDomination is not selling items or subscriptions, he is offering the server free without breaking any Moparscape rules now that he has changed the name of the server and is editing it’s content.
